content.rendered:
Redefining tourism, one trip at a time

A World Tourism Day appeal

“One Billion Tourists – One Billion Opportunities”: The motto of World Tourism Day brings home the huge influence of tourism on sustainable global development and thus, the responsibility of all those involved – travellers, tourism industry and, not least, policymakers.
